sourcesContent:
import MainImage from "../images/project-one/mainimage.png";

const articles = [
  {
    mainImage: MainImage,
    id: "01",
    name: "talk’n’roll",
    subHeading: "A social app to find gaming events near you",
    type: "Mobile Design ––– 2020",
    view: "view work",
    headerText:
      "Roll the dice  with your friends in a fun, new, social board game experience.",
    headerImage: "../images/project-one/cover.png",
    tools: "figma, illustrator",
    timeline: "2 weeks",
  },
  {
    mainImage: MainImage,
    id: "02",
    name: "Wonder",
    subHeading: "Physical Interface",
    type: "Mobile Design",
    view: "view work",
    tools: "figma, illustrator",
    timeline: "2 weeks",
  },
  {
    mainImage: MainImage,
    id: "03",
    name: "Physical Interface",
    subHeading: "A social app to find gaming events near you",
    type: "Product Design",
    view: "view work",
    tools: "figma, illustrator",
    timeline: "2 weeks",
  },
];

export default articles;
